short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View HEIC as Normal Image in Your Browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
有了这个插件，在任意页面上查看 HEIC 图片如同查看 JPG 图片一样自然、无感。
With this plugin, viewing HEIC images on any page feels as natural and seamless as viewing JPG images.

我们在意并尊重您的隐私，所以这个插件不会收集任何数据，所有的功能均运行在本地。
We care about and respect your privacy, so this plugin does not collect any data. All functionalities run locally.

如果喜欢这个插件，请给我们五星评分，这可以帮助到更多需要他的朋友，谢谢 ❤️。
If you like this plugin, please give us a five-star rating. This can help more friends who need it, thanks ❤️.
👇👇
